project_whitepaper.title: SwissDecentralGPT & SwissNFT-AI – Official Whitepaper
project_whitepaper.summary: A fully autonomous AI & Web3 ecosystem combining AI, language research, DeFi, and NFTs for scalable passive income.
goals: Automated revenue streams (AI coaching, NFT sales, staking, DeFi, launchpad)
Highest anonymity through offshore structures, DAOs, and crypto protection
Legal immunity through strategic company formations and asset protection
Exponential growth via full reinvestment and global expansion
Rising AI quality with increasing budget and machine learning improvements
Performance-based profit sharing for top employees
Flexible language learning subscriptions with personalized strategies
Support for various dialects & accents (Swiss German, global variations)
Fast, cost-effective, and scalable blockchain integration with Solana
Passive income through DeFi & staking – long-term benefits for users & investors

Milestones.Q2 2025: First strategic partnerships with language institutes
Milestones.Q3 2025: Advanced AI training with ML improvements
